name: gluebert
description: gluebert.js is a tiny helper orchestrating interactive html elements with on demand dynamic import Edit

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:karma && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:master: npm run test && npm run test:e2e:saucelabs
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm run build:demo && npm run test:e2e:testcafe
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs: npm run test:e2e:saucelabs:modern && npm run test:e2e:saucelabs:edge  && npm run test:e2e:saucelabs:mobile && npm run test:e2e:saucelabs:tablet
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs:ie_old: export SAUCE_BUILD=$npm_package_version && ./node_modules/.bin/testcafe 'saucelabs:internet explorer@9:Windows 7,saucelabs:internet explorer@10:Windows 8,saucelabs:internet explorer@11:Windows 8.1' ./e2e/**/*.e2e.spec.js --app 'npm run test:e2e:server' --app-init-delay $npm_package_config_sauce_app_init_delay --assertion-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_assert_timeout --selector-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_selector_timeout
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs:mobile: export SAUCE_BUILD=$npm_package_version && ./node_modules/.bin/testcafe 'saucelabs:iPhone Simulator@10.2,saucelabs:iPhone Simulator@9.2,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@6.0,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@5.1,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@4.4' ./e2e/**/*.e2e.spec.js --app 'npm run test:e2e:server' --app-init-delay $npm_package_config_sauce_app_init_delay --assertion-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_assert_timeout --selector-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_selector_timeout
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs:tablet: export SAUCE_BUILD=$npm_package_version && ./node_modules/.bin/testcafe 'saucelabs:iPad Simulator@10.2,saucelabs:iPad Simulator@9.2' ./e2e/**/*.e2e.spec.js --app 'npm run test:e2e:server' --app-init-delay $npm_package_config_sauce_app_init_delay --assertion-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_assert_timeout --selector-timeout $npm_package_config_sauce_selector_timeout

browsers.mobile: 'saucelabs:iPhone Simulator@10.2,saucelabs:iPhone Simulator@9.2,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@6.0,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@5.1,saucelabs:Android Emulator Phone@4.4'

author: Raphael Wildhaber
